Get started

Source: vignettes/get_started.Rmd
get_started.Rmd

Installation

# devtools::install_github("olugovoy/merra2ools")

Downloading the data

https://datadryad.org/stash/submission_process

Setting up

library(merra2ools)
check_merra2db(detailed = T)
#> The dirrectory C:/Users/olugo/Documents/data/merra2_subset doesn't exists
#> [1] FALSE

check_merra2db("D:/Dropbox/Xeon2x24/merra2/data")
#> [1] 487
set_merra2db("D:/Dropbox/Xeon2x24/merra2/data")
check_merra2db()
#> [1] 487
check_merra2db(detailed = T)

Test

# data("loc_id")
# loc_id
# locid <- loc_id
# rm(loc_id)
# locid$lon <- round(locid$lon, 3)
# locid$lat <- round(locid$lat, 1)
# locid <- rename(locid, locid = loc_id)
# save(locid, file = "data/locid.RData")
data("locid")
locid

lon <- unique(locid$lon)
head(lon, 10)
length(lon)

lat <- unique(locid$lat)
head(lat, 10)
length(lat)

lo <- unique(c(seq(-180, max(lon), by = 30), max(lon))) %>% sort()
la <- seq(-90, 90, by = 15)

locid_sample <- filter(locid, lon %in% lo, lat %in% la)
world_map <- map_data(map = "world") %>% as_tibble()

ggplot() + 
  geom_map(data = world_map, map = world_map, 
           aes(x = long, y = lat, map_id = region), 
           fill = "wheat", alpha = .75, colour = "grey", size = 0.25) +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_rect(aes(xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax, ymin = ymin, ymax = ymax),
    data = data.frame(xmin = -180, xmax = 180, ymin = -90, ymax = 90),
    alpha = .5, fill = NA, colour = "grey85") +
  geom_point(aes(x = lon, y = lat), data = locid_sample, size = 1, colour = "red") + 
  geom_text(aes(x = lon, y = lat, label = locid), data = locid_sample, 
             position = position_nudge(y = 4),
             alpha = 0.75,
             size = unit(3, "lines")) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = ceiling(lo), minor_breaks = ceiling(lo)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = round(la), minor_breaks = ceiling(la)) + 
  labs(x = "lon", title = "Location ID (`locid`) layout of MERRA-2 subset") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + 
  coord_fixed(1.2)

# dat <- locid %>%
#   mutate(col = sample(1:10,))

a <- ggplot() + 
  geom_map(data = world_map, map = world_map,
           aes(x = long, y = lat, map_id = region),
           fill = "wheat", alpha = 1, colour = "grey", size = 0.25) +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_raster(aes(lon, lat), fill = sample(1:10, nrow(locid), T), 
              data = locid, alpha = .3) +
    geom_rect(aes(xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax, ymin = ymin, ymax = ymax),
    data = data.frame(xmin = -180, xmax = 180, ymin = -90, ymax = 90),
    alpha = .5, fill = NA, colour = "grey25") +
  # geom_point(aes(x = lon, y = lat), data = locid_sample, size = 1, colour = "red") + 
  # geom_text(aes(x = lon, y = lat, label = locid), data = locid_sample, 
  #            position = position_nudge(y = 4),
  #            alpha = 0.75,
  #            size = unit(3, "lines")) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = ceiling(lo), minor_breaks = ceiling(lo)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = round(la), minor_breaks = ceiling(la)) + 
  labs(x = "lon"
       # , title = "Location ID (`locid`) layout of MERRA-2 subset"
       ) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + 
  coord_fixed(1.2)
a

a + geom_rect(aes(xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax, ymin = ymin, ymax = ymax),
    data = data.frame(xmin = -85, xmax = -75, ymin = 23, ymax = 33),
    alpha = .75, fill = NA, colour = "red")

a.zoom <- ggplot() + 
  geom_map(data = world_map, map = world_map,
           aes(x = long, y = lat, map_id = region),
           fill = "wheat", alpha = 1, colour = "grey", size = 0.25) +
  theme_bw() +
  # geom_raster(aes(lon, lat), fill = sample(1:10, nrow(locid), T), 
  #             data = locid, alpha = .3) +
    geom_rect(aes(xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax, ymin = ymin, ymax = ymax),
    data = data.frame(xmin = -180, xmax = 180, ymin = -90, ymax = 90),
    alpha = .5, fill = NA, colour = "grey25") +
  xlim(-85, -75) + ylim(23, 33) + 
  coord_fixed(1.)

# a.zoom + 
#   geom_rect(aes(xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax, ymin = ymin, ymax = ymax),
#     data = data.frame(xmin = -85, xmax = -75, ymin = 23, ymax = 33),
#     alpha = .75, fill = NA, colour = "red") +
#   geom_point(aes(x = lon, y = lat), data = locid, size = 1, colour = "red")

data("grid")
ii <- grid$lon >= -85 & grid$lon <= -75 & grid$lat >= 23 & grid$lat <= 33; summary(ii)

grid_df <- fortify(grid[ii,]) %>% as_tibble()
grid_df

# (dx <- diff(lon[1:2]))
# (dy <- diff(lat[1:2]))

# a.zoom + 
#   # geom_rect(aes(xmin = long - dx/2, xmax = long + dx/2, 
#   #               ymin = lat - dy/2, ymax = lat + dy/2),
#   #           data = grid_df, fill = NA, colour = "grey") +
#   geom_polygon(aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), fill = NA, 
#                colour = 1, data = grid_df, show.legend = F) +
#   # geom_raster(aes(long, lat, group = group, fill = group),
#   #           # fill = NA, 
#   #           colour = "grey",
#   #           hjust = 0., vjust = 0., data = grid_df, show.legend = F, alpha = .4) +
#   geom_point(aes(x = lon, y = lat), data = locid[ii,], size = 1, colour = "red")

a.zoom +
  geom_polygon(aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), fill = NA, 
               colour = "grey", data = grid_df, show.legend = F) +
  geom_point(aes(x = lon, y = lat), data = locid[ii,], size = 1, colour = "red")

if (!dir.exists("tmp")) dir.create("tmp")
gis_sp <- raster::getData("GADM", country = "USA", level = 1, path = "tmp/")
gis_sp@proj4string
gis_sp@bbox
length(gis_sp) # number of regions
# plot(gis_sp)
gis_sp <- gis_sp[gis_sp$NAME_1 == "Florida",]
plot(gis_sp)
gis_sp@data

gis_sp@proj4string
grid@proj4string
grid@proj4string <- gis_sp@proj4string

locid_grid@proj4string <- gis_sp@proj4string
gg <- over(locid_grid, gis_sp)
class(gg); dim(gg); head(gg[!is.na(gg$GID_0),])

gg <- over(gis_sp, locid_grid)

library("maps")
library("sf")
states <- st_as_sf(map("state", plot = FALSE, fill = TRUE))
head(states)

ggplot(data = world) +
    geom_sf() +
    geom_sf(data = states, fill = NA) +

    coord_sf(xlim = c(-88, -78), ylim = c(24.5, 33), expand = FALSE)

florida_df <- us_map("states", "FL")
usmap_transform(florida_df)
class(florida_df)
florida_sf <- st_as_sf(florida_df, coords = c("x", "y"))
plot(florida_sf)

# (load("..\\usensys\\data\\maps/usa49_tiny.RData"))
(load("..\\usensys\\data\\maps/usa49_light.RData"))

usa_49 <- usa49_light_sp

# florida_sf <- usa49_tiny_sf[usa49_tiny_sf$NAME_1 == "Florida",]

florida_sp <- usa_49[usa_49$NAME_1 == "Florida",]
names(florida_sp)
sp::plot(florida_sp)

data("grid")
grid@proj4string <- florida_sp@proj4string

?rgeos::gIntersection
rg <- rgeos::gIntersection(grid, florida_sp, byid = TRUE)
class(rg); length(rg); 
sp::plot(rg)

?raster::intersect
ri <- raster::intersect(grid, florida_sp)
class(ri); length(ri); 
sp::plot(ri)

ii <- locid$locid %in% ri$loc_id; summary(ii)
points(locid$lon[ii], locid$lat[ii], pch = 16, col = "red")

ir <- raster::intersect(florida_sp, grid)
